title: Manage a Titrated Medication
description: A nurse in the ICU is managing an insulin drip for a patient and needs to document dose changes based on hourly blood sugar checks.

tasks.description: Open the patient's MAR and find the insulin drip order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse locates the continuous infusion order.

tasks.description: Review the titration parameters defined in the order (e.g., 'If blood sugar > 200, increase rate by 1 unit/hr').
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse understands the protocol for adjusting the dose.

tasks.description: Document the latest blood sugar reading and adjust the infusion pump rate accordingly. Document the new rate in the MAR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse safely adjusts the medication dose per protocol and accurately documents the change.
